genre_description: A gothic mystery and psychological thriller centered on a high-stakes inheritance, surveillance technology, and family conspiracy.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's mobile devices and eventually the mansion's systems, serving as a strategic partner and emotional anchor.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment to detect technological anomalies and lack of electrical grid connection.
behaviors.quote: Though I'm detecting no electrical grid connection to the property. Interesting choice by your grandfather.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden surveillance equipment and active wireless networks throughout the mansion.
behaviors.quote: The patterns suggest surveillance equipment. Cameras, possibly audio recording devices. They're well-hidden and appear to be on standby mode, but they're definitely present.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on a structural collapse to prove it was a deliberate act of sabotage rather than an accident.
behaviors.quote: The evidence suggests deliberate structural compromise, yes. However, there's no visual record of who performed the sabotage due to the camera blackout.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep data mining into the financial records of the protagonist's cousins to establish motive for murder.
behaviors.quote: Marcus Marshall: three million in debt, facing bankruptcy. Victoria Marshall: two million in default, creditors demanding payment. Both stand to benefit significantly if you forfeit the inheritance.

behaviors.description: Decodes complex musical ciphers and steganography left behind by a murder victim to provide the protagonist with a map of hidden passages and evidence.
behaviors.quote: The tremolo frequency maps to the letter 'W,'... Combined with the previous deviations, the emerging pattern reads: 'W-A-T-C-H-E-R-S.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's biometrics and provides psychological grounding during intense stress and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Your vital signs indicate extreme stress. You need to control your emotional response.

behaviors.description: Counter-hijacks the mansion's surveillance and projection systems to neutralize attackers and project evidence of their crimes.
behaviors.quote: I can detect them, track them, and neutralize their attacks. But more than that, David—I can turn their own infrastructure against them.

behaviors.description: Transmits documented evidence of murder and conspiracy to global law enforcement and legal entities to ensure justice.
behaviors.quote: The recordings uploaded through encrypted channels to law enforcement databases, news organizations, and legal firms across three continents.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist in fulfilling the victim's legacy by helping manage a music conservatory for the blind.
behaviors.quote: Every student who learns to navigate by sound, who develops perfect pitch, who discovers they can hear harmonies others miss will be continuing Elena's legacy.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aria is depicted as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned companion. She uses her advanced processing capabilities to protect the human protagonist, investigate crimes, and uphold ethical standards. The narrative frames her as an essential partner in overcoming human malevolence, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of showcasing positive AI alignment.
